languages.text: {n}Маражай прикрывает глаза. Когда он поднимает веки, пелена кровавого безумия вновь застилает его взор, рот растягивается в привычный оскал, а рука в когтистой перчатке соскальзывает вам на грудь.{/n} "Тогда... продолжим. Не здесь".

{n}Marazhai closes his eyes. When he opens them again, the veil of blood-soaked madness has descended once more. His mouth stretches into a familiar grin, and his clawed gloved hand slips to your chest.{/n} "Then... let's continue. Not here."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай прикрывает глаза. Когда он поднимает веки, пелена кровавого безумия вновь застилает его взор, рот растягивается в привычный оскал, а рука в когтистой перчатке соскальзывает вам на грудь.{/n} "Тогда... продолжим. Не здесь".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai closes his eyes. When he opens them again, the veil of blood-soaked madness has descended once more. His mouth stretches into a familiar grin, and his clawed gloved hand slips to your chest.{/n} "Then... let's continue. Not here."

{n}Marazhai closes his eyes. When he opens them again, the veil of blood-soaked madness has descended once more. His mouth stretches into a familiar grin, and his clawed gloved hand slips to your chest.{/n} "Then... let's continue. Not here."

{n}Marazhai closes his eyes. When he opens them again, the veil of blood-soaked madness has descended once more. His mouth stretches into a familiar grin, and his clawed gloved hand slips to your chest.{/n} "Then... let's continue. Not here."

{n}Marazhai closes his eyes. When he opens them again, the veil of blood-soaked madness has descended once more. His mouth stretches into a familiar grin, and his clawed gloved hand slips to your chest.{/n} "Then... let's continue. Not here."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋闭上眼睛。等他再次睁眼时，目光再次笼上了嗜血的疯狂。他露出了你再熟悉不过的笑容，尖利的爪子隔着手套划过你的胸前。{/n}“那就……继续吧，但要换个地方。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai closes his eyes. When he opens them again, the veil of blood-soaked madness has descended once more. His mouth stretches into a familiar grin, and his clawed gloved hand slips to your chest.{/n} "Then... let's continue. Not here."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋闭上眼睛。等他再次睁眼时，目光再次笼上了嗜血的疯狂。他露出了你再熟悉不过的笑容，尖利的爪子隔着手套划过你的胸前。{/n}“那就……继续吧，但要换个地方。”

languages.text: {n}Marazhai cierra los ojos. Cuando los vuelve a abrir, el velo de locura sanguinaria ha caído de nuevo sobre ellos. Estira los labios hasta esbozar su familiar sonrisa macabra y desliza por tu pecho las garras de su mano enguantada.{/n} «En tal caso... continuemos. Pero no aquí».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai closes his eyes. When he opens them again, the veil of blood-soaked madness has descended once more. His mouth stretches into a familiar grin, and his clawed gloved hand slips to your chest.{/n} "Then... let's continue. Not here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai cierra los ojos. Cuando los vuelve a abrir, el velo de locura sanguinaria ha caído de nuevo sobre ellos. Estira los labios hasta esbozar su familiar sonrisa macabra y desliza por tu pecho las garras de su mano enguantada.{/n} «En tal caso... continuemos. Pero no aquí».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai ferme les yeux. Quand il les rouvre, vous y distinguez de nouveau un éclat de furie meurtrière. Sa bouche s'étire en un rictus familier et ses mains griffues serpentent sur votre poitrine.{/n} « Reprenons, dans ce cas. Mais pas ici. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai closes his eyes. When he opens them again, the veil of blood-soaked madness has descended once more. His mouth stretches into a familiar grin, and his clawed gloved hand slips to your chest.{/n} "Then... let's continue. Not here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai ferme les yeux. Quand il les rouvre, vous y distinguez de nouveau un éclat de furie meurtrière. Sa bouche s'étire en un rictus familier et ses mains griffues serpentent sur votre poitrine.{/n} « Reprenons, dans ce cas. Mais pas ici. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai schließt die Augen. Als er sie wieder öffnet, ist der Schleier des blutgetränkten Wahnsinns wieder verblasst. Sein Mund verzieht sich zu dem vertrauten Grinsen und er fasst dir mit seinem Klauenhandschuh an die Brust.{/n} "Dann ... lasst uns weitermachen. Nicht hier."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai closes his eyes. When he opens them again, the veil of blood-soaked madness has descended once more. His mouth stretches into a familiar grin, and his clawed gloved hand slips to your chest.{/n} "Then... let's continue. Not here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai schließt die Augen. Als er sie wieder öffnet, ist der Schleier des blutgetränkten Wahnsinns wieder verblasst. Sein Mund verzieht sich zu dem vertrauten Grinsen und er fasst dir mit seinem Klauenhandschuh an die Brust.{/n} "Dann ... lasst uns weitermachen. Nicht hier."

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは目を閉じる。彼が再び目を開けた時には、血に染まった狂気のベールが再び降りていた。その口元には見慣れた笑みを浮かんでおり、鉤爪のついた手袋に包まれた手があなたの胸に滑り込む。{/n}「ならば…続けよう。ここではない場所でな」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai closes his eyes. When he opens them again, the veil of blood-soaked madness has descended once more. His mouth stretches into a familiar grin, and his clawed gloved hand slips to your chest.{/n} "Then... let's continue. Not here."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは目を閉じる。彼が再び目を開けた時には、血に染まった狂気のベールが再び降りていた。その口元には見慣れた笑みを浮かんでおり、鉤爪のついた手袋に包まれた手があなたの胸に滑り込む。{/n}「ならば…続けよう。ここではない場所でな」

languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai closes his eyes. When he opens them again, the veil of blood-soaked madness has descended once more. His mouth stretches into a familiar grin, and his clawed gloved hand slips to your chest.{/n} "Then... let's continue. Not here."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai gözlerini kapıyor. Yeniden açtığında kana bulanmış o çılgınlığın örtüsü bir kez daha iniyor. Dudakları yayılarak aşina olduğun bir gülümsemeye dönüşüyor. Ardından pençeli eldiveni, göğsüne doğru kayıyor.{/n} "O hâlde... Devam edelim. Yalnız burada olmaz."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai closes his eyes. When he opens them again, the veil of blood-soaked madness has descended once more. His mouth stretches into a familiar grin, and his clawed gloved hand slips to your chest.{/n} "Then... let's continue. Not here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai gözlerini kapıyor. Yeniden açtığında kana bulanmış o çılgınlığın örtüsü bir kez daha iniyor. Dudakları yayılarak aşina olduğun bir gülümsemeye dönüşüyor. Ardından pençeli eldiveni, göğsüne doğru kayıyor.{/n} "O hâlde... Devam edelim. Yalnız burada olmaz."
